name: Dragon Crypto Aurum
description: Dragon Crypto Gaming (DCG) builds groundbreaking gaming experiences on the blockchain. For a deep dive into Dragon Crypto Gaming, please visit: https://dragoncrypto.io/ Dragon Crypto Aurum (DCAU) serves as a utility token that drives the in-game economy of various DCG game offerings. DCAU is used to purchase NFT game avatars and is required to perform important in-game actions such as battling and healing. For more information, please visit: https://aurumdraconis.dragoncrypto.io https://tinydragon.games/ DCAU is 100% community-owned and fully minted. It has also become deflationary through various in-game token burn mechanisms.
